entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 60 gusting to 80 over southern sections this morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
